Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO PROCUREMENT AND CONTRACTS

Title: Requires the state or any agency or authority thereof to purchase zero emission vehicles beginning in two thousand twenty-five
Summary: Requires the state or any agency or public authority thereof to purchase zero emission vehicles beginning in two thousand twenty-five.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the state or any agency or public authority thereof to purchase zero emission vehicles beginning in two thousand twenty-five
